Deathtouched Catacombs.name: Deathtouched Catacombs
Deathtouched Catacombs.description: Catacombs filled with the stench of death, Skeletons dwell in the shadows

Coastal Cave.name: Coastal Cave
Coastal Cave.description: Coastal Cave is a dark opening on the side of a cliff. Its mossy depths are overrun by hostile humanoid creatures, but those who brave it may find passage to new lands

Fringefolk Hero's Grave.name: Fringefolk Hero's Grave
Fringefolk Hero's Grave.description: Fingefolk Hero's Grave is a dark and secluded location within the Cave of Knowledge. The confused and aimless dwell within

Limgrave Tunnels.name: Limgrave Tunnels
Limgrave Tunnels.description: Limgrave Tunnels are a mine harvested for Glimstone. Its zealous miners don't dare venture into its hidden chambers, for fear of the hoarder Troll within

Groveside Cave.name: Groveside Cave
Groveside Cave.description: Groveside Cave is a small refuge for wildlife in Limgrave. Its proximity to water and ease of access make it a sought-after shelter against bad weather, but those who venture in don't seem to return

Highroad Cave.name: Highroad Cave
Highroad Cave.description: A cave that houses a tomb, deep within. It is situated at the northmost part of Limgrave. It has been inhabited by a pack of Wolves, Land Octopuses, and Giant Bats

Murkwater Catacombs.name: Murkwater Catacombs
Murkwater Catacombs.description: An underground cemetery that is located at the north-east side of Agheel Lake in Limgrave. Once a place for peaceful rest for fallen heroes, it is now infested by goblins.

Murkwater Cave.name: Murkwater Cave
Murkwater Cave.description: A dark cave halfway through the Murkwater River

Stormfoot Catacombs.name: Stormfoot Catacombs
Stormfoot Catacombs.description: Stormfoot Catacombs were meant as a restful place for the deceased, but its now overrun by Goblins. Its deepest secrets are secured by the Guardian of the Burial Tree

Earthbore Cave.name: Earthbore Cave
Earthbore Cave.description: Earthbore Cave is a small dark cave on the side of the Cliffside between Limgrave and Weeping Peninsula. One might be able to hear the squeaks of rats and the snoring of a large beast deep within if you listen closely

Impaler's Catacombs.name: Impaler's Catacombs
Impaler's Catacombs.description: The Impaler's Catacombs are found in the east side of the Weeping Peninsula. Once used to store the bodies of the dead, it is now crawling with Imps.

Morne Tunnel.name: Morne Tunnel
Morne Tunnel.description: A dark and hidden tunnel that is inhabited by Misbegottens and Miners.

Tombsward Cave.name: Tombsward Cave
Tombsward Cave.description: Hidden cave in the forest teeming with poison-filled creatures.

Tombsward Catacombs.name: Tombsward Catacombs
Tombsward Catacombs.description: The Tombsward Catacombs are hidden inside the mountain near the Minor Erdtree in the Weeping Peninsula. Once filled with the bodies of the dead, armed skeletons now rise to chase away those that wish to explore its depths.

Academy Crystal Cave.name: Academy Crystal Cave
Academy Crystal Cave.description: The depths of the Raya Lucaria Academy are rich in rose-tinted crystals, imbued with the natural magic of the area

Black Knife Catacombs.name: Black Knife Catacombs
Black Knife Catacombs.description: Black Knife Catacombs homes many skeletons and crabs within its depths, find and defeat the Black Knife Assassin within to obtain their dagger.

Lakeside Crystal Cave.name: Lakeside Crystal Cave
Lakeside Crystal Cave.description: Hidden on the southwestern cliffs of Liurnia of the Lakes, a winding cave carved by large crystals

Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel.name: Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel
Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel.description: One of the vast networks of tunnels used prominently for the academy's crystal mining operation.

Road's End Catacombs.name: Road's End Catacombs
Road's End Catacombs.description: Catacombs at the end of the world..

Stillwater Cave.name: Stillwater Cave
Stillwater Cave.description: A dark and murky cave beset by a poisonous miasma. Home to servants of rot, relishing in the presence of the giant poisonblooms endemic to the cave

Caelid Catacombs.name: Caelid Catacombs
Caelid Catacombs.description: A labyrinth of Scarlet Rot-soaked floors and tunnels.

Gael Tunnel.name: Gael Tunnel
Gael Tunnel.description: A set of tunnels found on the western edge of Caelid, along the border to Limgrave

Gaol Cave.name: Gaol Cave
Gaol Cave.description: Found at the west of Caelid.

Minor Erdtree Catacombs.name: Minor Erdtree Catacombs
Minor Erdtree Catacombs.description: Minor Erdtree Catacombs is a Location in Elden Ring. The Minor Erdtree Catacombs is found in Caelid, beneath the Minor Erdtree. Players can reach this location by traveling east from where the region meets with Limgrave and then looking for the entrance behind the tree, in the north.

Sellia Crystal Tunnel.name: Sellia Crystal Tunnel
Sellia Crystal Tunnel.description: The crystal mining operation of Sellia is overseen by greedy and aggressive insectoids

War-Dead Catacombs.name: War-dead Catacombs
War-Dead Catacombs.description: Catacombs for those who have died a glorious battle death

Altus Tunnel.name: Altus Tunnel
Altus Tunnel.description: The Altus tunnels were once used to supply the lands with quality crystals

Altus Tunnel.name: Altus Tunnel
Altus Tunnel.description: The Altus tunnels were once used to supply the lands with quality crystals

Altus Tunnel.name: Old Altus Tunnel
Altus Tunnel.description: An old mining site, still active to this day. Its tunnels echo with the grunts and groans of the commoners, tirelessly slaving away, grinding at the rich reservoir of crystals deep within

Old Altus Tunnel.name: Old Altus Tunnel
Old Altus Tunnel.description: An old mining site, still active to this day. Its tunnels echo with the grunts and groans of the commoners, tirelessly slaving away, grinding at the rich reservoir of crystals deep within

Sealed Tunnel.name: Sealed Tunnel
Sealed Tunnel.description: Not as small or abandoned as it looks.

Gelmir Hero's Grave.name: Gelmir Hero's Grave
Gelmir Hero's Grave.description: Large Catacombs housing an ancient hero of Mt. Gelmir.

Sage's Cave.name: Sage's Cave
Sage's Cave.description: Sage's Cave is a dark opening in the side of a mountain. Its dark depths are overrun by hostile undead, but those who brave it may find treasures beyond compare

Unsightly Catacombs.name: Unsightly Catacombs
Unsightly Catacombs.description: A burial grounds crawling with Misbegotten creatures found deep beneath the Perfumer's Ruins. Despite its decrepit state, the catacombs give off a trace of fragrant aromas juxtaposed by the scent of the ancient dead

Seethewater Cave.name: Seethewater Cave
Seethewater Cave.description: A cave found along the Seethewater Ravine.

Wyndham Catacombs.name: Wyndham Catacombs
Wyndham Catacombs.description: Burial grounds located beneath Wyndham Ruins.

Volcano Cave.name: Volcano Cave
Volcano Cave.description: A cave system at the highest point of Mt. Gelmir, made into a home by a family of Demi-Humans hiding their maddened Queen.

Dragonbarrow Cave.name: Dragonbarrow Cave
Dragonbarrow Cave.description: A small dungeon found beneath the Minor Erdtree in Dragonbarrow

Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave.name: Giant-conquering Hero's Grave
Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave.description: A complex dungeon filled with invulnerable enemies and strange golden floor seals.

Spiritcaller's Cave.name: Spiritcaller's Cave
Spiritcaller's Cave.description: A cave found by the Freezing Lake, heavily battered by the elements

Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs.name: Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs
Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs.description: The Catacombs of the fields leading to Miquella's Haligtree hide powerful secrets, but are zealously guarded

Hidden Path to the Haligtree.name: Hidden Path To The Haligtree
Hidden Path to the Haligtree.description: The secret passage leading to Miquella's Haligtree has been polluted by Those Who Live in Dead

Yelough Anix Tunnel.name: Yelough Anix Tunnel
Yelough Anix Tunnel.description: An icy tunnel on the southern edge of the Yelough Anix Ruins
